events.message: I would like to request a refund for the jacket I purchased last week because it does not fit as described.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund based on keywords about money back and return.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah Thompson who handles refund requests.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your purchase. I'd be happy to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you want to return the jacket? This will help us process your refund quickly.
My order number is 9876543. The jacket is too small even though I followed the size chart exactly, so I'd like a full refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund once we receive the returned item. I will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label. I appreciate the smooth process and will send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your full refund. You should see the amount back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund successfully and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund has been completed and there are no further issues, we are now closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
